cards.rules_text:
Whenever a battle you control is defeated or whenever a creature you control dies, put a charge counter on Starlight Dome.
Once during each of your turns, you may cast a permanent spell from your hand or graveyard with mana value less than or equal to the number of charge counters on Starlight Dome without paying its mana cost.

Each player reveals their hand and library. Exile all enchantment cards, non-Human creature cards, and planeswalker cards from the battlefield, from graveyards, and from among the revealed cards. Each player shuffles, then draws a card for each card exiled from their hand this way.

As Genomic Blueprint enters the battlefield, choose a nonland card name.
Triggered abilities of sources with the chosen name don't trigger.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Starlight seeks not only to control the population, but their every potential future.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Gain control of target land unless its controller sacrifices two creatures.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Rich in resources and strategically located amid shipping routes, Faleset was chosen as the ideal location for Starlight to build its underground complex. Its native populace were an inconvenience to overcome.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Starlight Researcher enters the battlefield tapped.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Deployed to phenomenon zones across St. Cahand, Starlight agents catalog events and evidence they will go to their graves swearing never existed.[/i]

cards.flavor_text: [i]Far from the front lines, individual acts of state terror ensure the balance of power never tips against the Starlight agency.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Vigilance
cards.flavor_text: [i]Volunteers from across St. Cahand abandoned any sense of national duty or civic pride, clamoring to join the genocidal vanguard descending on Faleset.[/i]

cards.flavor_text: [i]Project Starlight worked—in a way. The multiverse retreated in the face of potent anti-magic technologies. St. Cahand was alone at last. Utterly alone.[/i]

First strike

{W}{U} LONE WOLF Attack players and battles with solitary creatures to boost your success.
{U}{B} OPERATIONS These battles are fought in secret, with solitary attackers.
{B}{R} PARADOX Cast spells from anywhere other than your hand.
{R}{G} FORETELL Something strange and hidden is in the air. Lay your spells aside for later and revel in mystery.
{G}{W} LONE WOLF Your lonely attackers thrive in solitude with buffs and boosts.
{W}{B} ALONE Spread your attackers out—Operations and lone wolf triggers are your weapons.
{B}{G} OPERATIONS Outgrind your opponents with stealthy attackers and recursion.
{G}{U} OPERATIONS Your hardened agents adapt and overcome in the face of fresh battles.
{U}{R} FORETELL Hold a spell in secret like the threat of mass destruction, and out-bluff your foe.
{R}{W} NONCREATURES Civilians mean nothing to you. Forge victory by casting nnoncreature spells to succeed.

Menace

When Rendition Raid enters the battlefield or is defeated, it deals 2 damage to target creature an opponent controls and 1 damage to that creature's controller.

[i]({T}: Add {W} or {U}.)[/i]
Bayt Al-Tiyn, Besieged enters the battlefield tapped.
{WU}{WU}{WU}{WU}{WU}, {T}, Exile Bayt Al-Tiyn: After this phase, there is an additional beginning phase. Activate only as a sorcery.
Exile all graveyards, then create a token that's a copy of a permanent card exiled this way.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Far from punishing crimes against humanity, Starlight actively headhunted scientists willing to push the boundaries of ethics, knowing its new world demanded sacrifice to be birthed.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. A creature attacking an Operation alone has menace.)[/i]
When Eliminate Any Collateral enters the battlefield or is defeated, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

Target creature gains deathtouch and lifelink until end of turn.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Those who have no connection to the land will always fear it.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. A creature attacking an Operation alone has menace.)[/i]
When Triumph of Liberalism enters the battlefield or is defeated, it deals 3 damage to up to one target tapped creature or creature that blocked this turn.

[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. A creature attacking an Operation alone has menace.)[/i]
When Infiltrate the Industry enters the battlefield or is defeated, surveil 3. [i](Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)[/i]

[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. A creature attacking an Operation alone has menace.)[/i]
When Recover Lost Assets enters the battlefield or is defeated, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

Menace
When Yuri Belyik, Astralnaut enters the battlefield, search your library for a battle or planeswalker card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
